title: Scary Stories #9: Muahaha! (CRE904)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! Robin Reiser, Ansley Isham, Kristen Ludwig, Burke Heffner and Erika Steigerwald share scary stories in our 2017 Halloween episode.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Bobby "Boris" Pickett & The Crypt-Kickers, Los Straitjackets, Robin Reiser, JJ Evans, Ansley Isham, Kristen Ludwig, Yeah Yeah Yeahs, Burke Heffner, Erika Steigerwald, Santana, Tom Waits, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison)
